event: intravenous micronutrient supplementation for B1, B6, and levocarnitine
urine and bronchial aspirate obtained for Mycoplasma and Ureaplasma PCR
Cryptococcal serum and cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) antigen titers positive
cultures from bronchoalveolar lavage, CSF, and blood revealed cryptococcal growth
unable to wean from mechanical ventilation
moved to comfort care in hospice
normal serum citrulline and arginine level
